VB_OwlBearPrints.synopsis: The player discovers a large set of animal tracks. They may be able to identify them as those of an owlbear.

VB_OwlBearPrints_0.speaker: Player
VB_OwlBearPrints_0.text: Looks like a beast came through here - a big one too.
VB_OwlBearPrints_0.context: NodeContext: Cautious. Spoken in reference to a large set of animal tracks they've spotted.

VB_OwlBearPrints_1.speaker: Player
VB_OwlBearPrints_1.text: Owlbear tracks. Its nest must be nearby.
VB_OwlBearPrints_1.context: NodeContext: Spoken with curiosity and a degree of authority - they're familiar with the beast they refer to.
